channel.description: Recent content in Telephony on Blog

item.title: Connecting your Website and Contact Center
item.description: The old way: What others still doing… Photo source: Unplash. Creative Commons Outdated technologies are weighing companies down by limiting their view of customers and making it difficult to connect with the new digital age interactions over IP. Click-to-Call & Callback This option requires to get the user phone number in oder to make a call; remember all new digital customers don’t like to give up a cell or landline number anymore.
